name: Bees (demo)
description:
Bees is a Farming Simulator focussed on bees.

This project is just a first/demo version. I'll probably continue working on this some time later.
There isn't really a lot of content but I thought i would upload it anyways for now.

You start out with building a hive (it comes with a bee) and placing a flower on a field.
Press B to enter/exit a First-Person WASDQE Perspective.
